cartridges.notes: Also known as 9mm Parabellum, most popular pistol cartridge

cartridges.notes: NATO military specification, similar to .308 Winchester

cartridges.description: Classic American hunting cartridge, excellent versatility

cartridges.name: .338 Lapua Magnum
cartridges.notes: Designed for extreme long-range precision, very high pressure

cartridges.name: .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO)

standards.name: NATO

metadata.description: Cartridge specifications database for barrel safety factor calculations
notes: All pressure values are in SI units (MPa)
All diameter values are in millimeters (mm)
Chamber diameter is the internal diameter at the chamber/breech end
Bore diameter is the internal diameter at the muzzle end
Pressure values include typical safety margins above proof loads
Standard pressure values are provided in both MPa and PSI for reference
Consult current standards for critical applications
Military cartridges may have different specifications than civilian variants
